column4: Multiple frozen bridges on the north side, and various roadways are very slick.  Salt trucks are out.
Police have been working, and continue to work, numerous collisions.
Use added caution, slow down, and increase following distances.
Plan for a longer commute time this morning.
Old Paris Rd at Strawberry Fields Rd.
Hays Blvd near Levi Todd Blvd
column5: Possible road closure due to a working structure fire.

column4: Fayette County Public Schools are closed today due to slick roadway conditions.

column3: New Traffic Signals on Citation Blvd at Sandersville Rd:
column4: Scheduled for full activation on Friday 1/27 between 9 a.m. and 3 p.m.

column3: New Traffic Signals on Citation Blvd at Sandersville Rd:
column4: Use added caution while traffic adjusts to the new control measures.

column3: Upgraded Traffic Signals on Clays Mill Rd at Pasadena Dr:

column3: Upgraded Traffic Signals on Clays Mill Rd at Pasadena Dr:
